entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:48 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight then light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
